message: Downtown Montreal Friday morning, anyone else?
Apple.ca has the order page up and ready to go, but you can't order yet.
I think the online orders start in a few minutes. I'm going to try it and see how long it says for shipping. I figure I can cancel the order if I get lucky tomorrow.
I got mine without lining up. I hope everyone else got theirs.
@justinluey that's great!  What colour iPad and smart cover did you end up choosing?
@marle I got the black iPad and light blue smart cover. I had no choice on the iPad and limited choice on the covers, but this combo is what I was leaning towards anyway.
